name: Brainstorming Ideas
description: Generate a list of ideas or themes for the story.
expected_output: A diverse collection of story ideas or themes.

name: Creating Characters
description: Develop the main and supporting characters with backstories, personalities, and motivations.

name: Outlining the Plot
description: Craft an outline of the main plot points and structure of the story.
expected_output: A clear plot outline with key events and turning points.

name: Setting the Scene
description: Establish the setting where the story takes place, including time and location.

name: Writing the First Draft
description: Compose the first version of the story, focusing on getting ideas down.
expected_output: Complete first draft of the story.

name: Revising and Editing
description: Review and refine the draft for coherence, grammar, and style.
expected_output: Updated draft with revisions and corrections.

name: Finalizing the Manuscript
description: Prepare the final version of the story for submission or publication.
